General.Name: Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang China Light&Textile Industrial City Group Co.,Ltd engages in the development, leasing, and property management of business houses in the China Textile City market, integrating market, logistics and e-commerce platforms in China. It is also involved in the wholesale trading of textile fabrics; market development; leasing and service management; finance; industrial investment; transportation; and provision of information service. In addition, the company develops, operates, and manages an international logistics center; and textile trade information portal. Zhejiang China Light&Textile Industrial City Group Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
General.Address: China Textile City Group Building, Shaoxing, China, 312030
